verbose_text: Mn caused significant damage to the sensory hair cells, peripheral auditory nerve fibers and spiral ganglion neurons (SGN) in cochlear organotypic cultures isolated from postnatal day three rats and caused significant loss and shrinkage of SGN soma [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Mn caused significant damage to the sensory hair cells, peripheral auditory nerve fibers and spiral ganglion neurons (SGN) in cochlear organotypic cultures isolated from postnatal day three rats and caused significant loss and shrinkage of SGN soma
